MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH29 postcode area of Kirkliston. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 04.44am. Repairs are taking longer than expected  due to onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07:40am on Friday, 11 December 2020
